biotools.summary: ARTDeco is a pipeline for analyzing and characterizing transcriptional readthrough. ARTDeco functions to process a set of BAM files such that transcriptional readthrough can be quantified via a variety of measures including read-in levels, readthrough levels, downstream of gene (DoG) transcript detection, and inference of read-in genes. ARTDeco can also correct gene expression values by using read-in levels to deconvolute native gene expression and contribution from upstream readthrough transcription. ARTDeco works on both single-end and paired-end data, stranded and unstranded data, and forward and reverse strand oriented data.
